posts.text: Hello World Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. 这里是Args建立的第一个个人博客 20计算机科学与技术三班 Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
